entities.name: mione
entities.description: Mione is mentioned as offering to accompany Harry into Umbridge's office as a sign of solidarity and loyalty. She is described as looking relieved that Harry accepted the plan.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as accepting Mione's offer and planning to sneak into Umbridge's office. He is described as being angry when Hermione hesitates.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the person whose office Harry and Mione plan to sneak into. The location of her office is specified as having a corridor.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as being part of the Inquisitorial Squad that is floating around Umbridge's office.

entities.name: inquisitorial squad
entities.description: The Inquisitorial Squad is mentioned as a group that is floating around Umbridge's office and making it difficult for Harry and Mione to sneak in.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being tortured by Umbridge. This is used as motivation for Harry to act quickly.

relationships.description: Harry and Mione plan to accompany each other into Umbridge's office.
Harry plans to sneak into Umbridge's office with the help of Mione.
Filch is part of the Inquisitorial Squad that is floating around Umbridge's office.
Harry is concerned for Sirius, who is being tortured by Umbridge.
